member.summary: Retrieves the request body as a string. Note that once this method returns, the underlying input stream cannot be read again as it is not rewindable for obvious reasons. This functionality is by design.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Extensions.NoCache(System.Net.HttpListenerContext)
member.summary: Sends headers to disable caching on the client side.

member.summary: Sets a response static code of 302 and adds a Location header to the response in order to direct the client to a different URL
member.param: if set to true [use absolute URL].

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This constructor does not provide any Logging capabilities.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. This constructor does not provide any Logging capabilities.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. NOTE: urlPrefix must be specified as something similar to: http://localhost:9696/ Please notice the ending slash. -- It is important
member.exception: The HTTP Listener is not supported in this OS

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.Module``1
member.summary: Gets the module registered for the given type. Returns null if no module matches the given type.

member.summary: Gets the module registered for the given type. Returns null if no module matches the given type.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.RegisterModule(Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.IWebModule)
member.summary: Registers an instance of a web module. Only 1 instance per type is allowed.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.UnregisterModule(System.Type)
member.summary: Unregisters the module identified by its type.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.HandleClientRequest(System.Net.HttpListenerContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Handles the client request.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.ProcessRequest(System.Net.HttpListenerContext,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Process HttpListener Request and returns true if it was handled

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.RunAsync(System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Starts the listener and the registered modules
member.param: The cancellation token; when cancelled, the server cancels all pending requests and stops.
member.returns: Returns the task that the HTTP listener is running inside of, so that it can be waited upon after it's been canceled.
member.remarks: Both the server and client requests are queued separately on the thread pool, so it is safe to call in a synchronous method.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.WebServer.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases unmanaged and - optionally - managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.summary: Static method to create webserver instance

member.summary: Gets or sets the expiration. By default, expiration is 30 minutes

member.name: P:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.LocalSessionModule.CookiePath
member.summary: Gets or sets the cookie path. If left empty, a cookie will be created for each path. The default value is "/" If a route is specified, then session cookies will be created only for the given path. Examples of this are: "/" "/app1/"

member.summary: A base class that defines how to handle WebSockets connections. It keeps a list of connected WebSockets and has the basic logic to handle connections and data transmission

member.summary: Gets the Currently-Connected WebSockets.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.WebSocketsServer.#ctor(System.Boolean,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: if set to true [enable connection watchdog].
Maximum size of the message in bytes. Enter 0 or negative number to prevent checks.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.WebSocketsServer.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class. With dead connection watchdog and no message size checks.

member.name: M:Unosquare.Labs.EmbedIO.Modules.WebSocketsServer.RunConnectionWatchdog
member.summary: Runs the connection watchdog. Removes and disposes stale WebSockets connections every 10 minutes.

member.summary: Accepts the WebSocket connection. This is a blocking call so it must be called within an independent thread.

member.summary: Removes and disposes the web socket.

member.summary: Removes and disposes all disconnected sockets

member.summary: Sends a UTF-8 payload

member.summary: Sends a binary payload

member.summary: Broadcasts the specified payload to all connected WebSockets clients.

member.summary: Broadcasts the specified payload to all connected WebSockets clients.

member.summary: Closes the specified web socket, removes it and disposes it.

member.summary: Called when the server has removed a WebSockets connected client for any reason.
